params.name: model_config
params.description: The model config that will be used to get model specific arguments used when generating.

params.name: device
params.description: The device which was used during watermarked text generation.

params.name: watermarking_config
params.description: The exact same watermarking config and arguments used when generating text.

params.name: ignore_repeated_ngrams
params.description: Whether to count every unique ngram only once or not.

params.name: max_cache_size
params.description: The max size to be used for LRU caching of seeding/sampling algorithms called for every token.
